list-item.p: to consider future changes in general and climate change in particular in all steps of conservation management planning,
to enhance cooperation between protected areas and to align their management,
to take particular responsibility for ecosystem-based adaptation and climate management in protected areas and also their surroundings involving all relevant stakeholders,
to build strong and systematic monitoring systems to measure goal achievement and management effectiveness and inform management planning,

to build capacity for climate change management and install persons or larger management units that are commissioned to particularly deal with climate change and with climate change mitigation and adaptation,
to accomplish with the information and education mission of protected areas in terms of climate change and its implications on local, regional, national and international level, and thus
to inform and educate about options of mitigation and adaptation to climate change, ecosystem-based adaptation and climate management.
